column1: 22389,Giant-Size X-Men: First Class (2008) #1,1,13261,165,"Just in time for Halloween, The Beast starts conducting investigations into his own ""X"" files around the world! Are there aliens among us- or things even weirder? Featuring special guest-star artists and classic material too! And emboldened by the safety net of Nowlan inks, Parker even drew the cover!,2008,10
